id.start:
📸 Kirim URL profil Instagram untuk melihat:
- Foto Profil HD
- Story Terbaru
- Highlight
- Info Profil

Contoh URL: https://www.instagram.com/nasa/
id.private_profile: 🔒 Profil privat - Anda belum follow akun ini

en.start:
📸 Send an Instagram profile URL to view:
- HD Profile Picture
- Latest Stories
- Highlights
- Profile Info

Example URL: https://www.instagram.com/nasa/
en.error: ⚠️ An error occurred, try again later
en.private_profile: 🔒 Private profile - You haven't followed this account
